title: This Adorable Post By Sania Mirza On Her Son Izhaan's First Birthday Is Just Heartwarming
text:
This Adorable Post By Sania Mirza On Her Son Izhaan's First Birthday Is Just Heartwarming

This Adorable Post By Sania Mirza On Her Son Izhaan's First Birthday Is Just Heartwarming

It's a proud day for Sania Mirza and Shoaib Malik as they couple celebrate the first birthday of their child Izhaan Mirza Malik.

It was on October 30, 2018, that Sania had given birth to Izhaan. She married Shoaib in 2010.

Celebrating the occasion, Sania post a beautiful message on Instagram.

instagram

It really is heartwarming. Take a look:

En route to an on-court return, Sania has enthralled fans with many pictures and videos from the fitness sessions that she is undergoing in order to return to the court in best possible shape.

It hasn't been just Sania's pictures which were shared on Instagram through this entire journey. Baby Izhaan has also often been spotted with her mother. Recently, the tennis star had also shared a picture of her child holding a cricket bat. While he only is one year old right now, fans have started to believe that Izhaan might go on to follow his father's footsteps one day.

Don't Miss 11.6 K SHARES 15 K SHARES 11.7 K SHARES 10.4 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES

instagram

Sania, the six-time Grand Slam winner, is eyeing a return on the court in next year's Olympic Games. While these are still early days on road to being fully fit for the sport once again, Sania seems as determined as ever to embrace the post-motherhood phase and continue her career on the tennis court.

With Inputs From TNN.
description: It's a proud day for Indian tennis star, Sania Mirza, and Pakistani cricketer, Shoaib Malik, as the couple celebrate the first birthday of their child Izhaan Mirza Malik. It was on October 30, 2018, that Sania had given birth to Izhaan, having married Shoaib in 2010.
